title: Billy Gene Is Marketing - Why You Suck At Being Polarizing
itunes:title: Billy Gene Is Marketing - Why You Suck At Being Polarizing
description:
There’s a lot of opinions on the Internet. No brainer. In fact, they’re inescapable. So, how do you know who’s just spitting out whatever they think will get people’s attention and who actually knows something? For that, we turn to the best.
 
Billy Gene of Billy Gene Is Marketing returns to the show today to check back in, talk about what he’s learned since the last time, drop some wisdom and nothing but the truth, and let us know what he’s got in store with his new podcast, Billy Gene Is Marketing Offends the Internet.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach and Billy dig into what being polarizing actually means, as well as what it doesn’t, why clarity is the key factor for a killer offer, and how much faster success comes if you know exactly what you can do (and you put the actual work in). Listen in to once again hear from a legend.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/billy-gene/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
